text: @MollyMcKew Can we please arrest Fradulent investor Jared Kushner for using his political advisor position to steal money from the US Treasury for his startup ventures that continually get bailed out by brokers, some from Qatar. #LockHimUp federal prison - he can reap what he sowed. #COVID19
